reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandkids love these. We are on our second set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cool and fun
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. These monster trucks were awesome goodie bag favors for a birthday party. They go super fast when pushed and sometimes if they hit a wall or furniture leg they flip on their side or back and keep going. The kids had a blast with them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun for a car loving toddler
reviews.reviewText: My son got these for Christmas, and he likes them. They're a little on the light side compared to some of the others of the same type. He likes that they are the pull-back style, and that they are different colors. He likes to play racing with his older sister. I hope they hold up for a while, since they are so light, but so far so good. I think for the price of $14 they might be on the expensive side, but they're worth $10 for sure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very impressed with these trucks. I wasn’t expecting a ton because they are so reasonably priced, but the quality exceeds my expectations. They drive really nicely and have good push power. They are a nice size and my toddler loves playing with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute set of monster trucks, fairly sturdy
reviews.reviewText: This is a nicely made set of small monster trucks. The pull back and release feature works really well and is easy for a toddler to use. The vehicles are holding up pretty well to banging into walls and being tossed about by a little one.This review is for sfrvkly Monster Truck Toy Cars Girls Boys 4 Pack for Toddlers Boys Gifts 2 3 4 5 6 7 Years Old 360 Rotation Car Toys for Girls Boys Cars for Toddlers Pull Back

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The kiddos love it
reviews.reviewText: Not gonna lie, when it arrived there was only 1 shown on the box. But once we opened it there were 4 mini monster trucks. The kids love riling it up and watching it go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Grandson loves this toy.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my grandson as a birthday present for his second birthday and by far this seems to be his favorite toy now. He has quite an active imagination and runs it through many different play sessions. Definitely a one off accidental hit we didn't expect to have such an impact. It's well made and been through the wringer yet still just as it was brand new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids loves these so much
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old and her friend had a blast playing with these and they are so wonderful! I love that they are so easy to play with and you don't need a ton of space. My only issue is that my daughter fell on one of them and it broke the case for the gears and they wouldn't go back into place so it had to be thrown out but the others are fine and hold up really well
